allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Fix TypeScript errors in frontend

- Add vite-env.d.ts for import.meta.env types
- Remove unused imports in Reportes, Rondas, Rutas, Vigilantes
- Remove unused index parameter in RondaDetalle

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Fix CORS to allow multiple origins

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
